last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: Darryl and Darrell host a leaving party and the team let their hair down. But it could end in tears.

name: Bloods
overview: When tough-acting loner paramedic Maleek is paired with over-friendly divorcee Wendy, their partnership looks dead on arrival. But pretty soon they're giving each other life support.

episodes.name: Partners
episodes.overview: Spiky South London boy Maleek is not impressed by new partner Wendy, a middle-aged divorcee who's just moved to the capital.

episodes.name: Air Ambulance
episodes.overview: Maleek reveals his dream of a job in the helicopter service, after meeting arrogant air ambulance paramedic Phil.

episodes.name: Daycare
episodes.overview: When Maleek bumps into old flame Nicole, a single mum, Wendy sees the chance to get them together - by looking after her son.

episodes.name: Bike Patrol
episodes.overview: After their screw-up with the kid, Maleek is punished with pushbike duty, while Wendy has to work under Jo's observation.

episodes.name: Siren Song
episodes.overview: Wendy discovers Maleek is a talented singer, but refuses to sing after a traumatic teenage experience, so tries everything she can to hear his voice.

episodes.name: Childbirth
episodes.overview: With the partnership in tatters, Maleek and Wendy are forced to deliver a baby together on the underground.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Wendy and Maleek find new sources of conflict when they are involved in a malpractice investigation and Wendy's deeply irritating son starts work at the depot.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: George struggles to make a difference at the mental health crime scene that is South Hill, much to Jo's delight. Spencer gets a job at the depot. Darrell faces deportation back to Australia.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Maleek and Wendy are sent out to a school to teach a knife crime awareness workshop - things do not go according to plan. Jo flirts with Lawrence and stonewalls George. Gary and Kareshma are reunited with Tasha.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Wendy realises she has to address Spencer's poor behaviour when he spends the day on the road with her and Maleek. Jo makes an allegation against George.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Jo hopes for a New Year's Eve kiss from Lawrence. Wendy and Maleek misdiagnose a patient.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Wendy and Maleek work a shift at a football match to take their minds off the upcoming Serious Incident Investigation.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Wendy and Maleek face the Serious Incident Investigation panel - will their friendship survive intact?

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Maleek struggles in the aftermath of the Serious Incident Investigation, while there's devastating news for Kareshma and Gary.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: With Jo away at training, Gary finds himself in charge of the depot. Lawrence decides it's time to make his feelings known.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Darryl and Darrell host a leaving party and the team let their hair down. But it could end in tears.
